backend/main.mo: Minimal Motoko canister entry point defining an empty actor with no methods.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting a UI change to switch global theme background colors to bright magenta via Tailwind CSS variables, with high confidence.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing key frontend files, including global styles, main app component, page content, and Tailwind configuration.
frontend/index.css: Legacy/global Tailwind CSS base layer defining extensive OKLCH color tokens for light and dark themes, including background, card, sidebar, and chart variables.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry document that mounts the React app to a root div and loads the main TypeScript module.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component that renders the YellowSunrisePage as the entire application.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook that creates and caches a backend canister actor using React Query, recreating it when the Internet Identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Authentication context and provider managing Internet Identity login, logout, persisted identities, and login status state.
frontend/src/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS styles defining a bright magenta OKLCH color theme for light and dark modes with readable foreground contrast.
frontend/src/main.tsx: React entry point that initializes React Query, Internet Identity provider, imports global styles, and renders the App.
frontend/src/pages/YellowSunrisePage.tsx: Single-page informational React view about sunrise phenomena, composed of themed sections, cards, icons, and images using Tailwind and shadcn UI.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration enabling class-based dark mode, OKLCH color tokens via CSS variables, custom fonts, animations, and plugins.
project_state.json: Tracks overall project metadata and state for an ICP dapp with Motoko backend and Vite+React (shadcn/ui) frontend, including existing features, pending requests, and architectural notes. Notably documents Internet Identity integration, initial Yellow Sunrise page, build tooling, and a pending/global theme change to bright magenta.
